The plans for the Student Activities Center renovations have been drawn up and the costs have been estimated PERIOD



Student Body President Caleb Judy said he will ask the Apportionment Board for an additional . to pay for the multiple changes that will be made to the room PERIOD

Itll make our office more professional Judy said PERIOD

The total cost of the project is . but Judy confirmed with Shirley Stewart vice president for Student Affairs that  will be used from the campus improvement fee PERIOD

Ive tried to find additional ways to fund the remainder of the project and the only other source I can think of is the Apportionment Board Judy said PERIOD

The room is located on the second floor of the Martin Luther King Jr PERIOD University Union PERIOD

Deborah Black construction project coordinator for Facilities Planning and Management previously said the idea of the renovation is to make the center more functional PERIOD

It will increase its usefulness Black said PERIOD

The current plans will see the activities center fully renovated by sometime during the fall semester but that is not certain Black said PERIOD

Black said the room needs to be worked on because its getting outdated PERIOD

We want to bring things up to modern design she said PERIOD

Judy said everybody that uses the room will benefit because it will increase work space PERIOD

Its needed very much Judy said PERIOD Its just due for an upgrade. the budget Judy wrote out to present to AB includes the payment of workers and objects like carpet and furniture will be added PERIOD

Carpenters painters and electricians will all be needed for the renovations Judy said PERIOD

Almost everything in the Union is renovated Judy said PERIOD The Student Activities Center needs it. the groups occupying the room on a regular basis are Student Government University Board the Black Student Union the National PanHellenic Council the Interfraternity Council and the Panhellenic Council PERIOD All Recognized Student Organizations have mailboxes in the room as well PERIOD

The Student Senate has five executive positions and the senate speaker each has an office in the activities center PERIOD

Judy said each executive office will be increased by four inches PERIOD

Bill Davidson student executive vice president has an office in the activities center and said the renovations will be very helpful to every student that uses the room PERIOD

It will be good for RSOs to have a central location for everything from mailboxes to computer usage Davidson said PERIOD

Many students use the room every day and Davidson said the proposed renovations will make it more comfortable PERIOD

Overall itll be a much more friendly environment Davidson said PERIOD

The plans also include the removal of the big yellow monster in the center of the activities center which holds office space for several groups that occupy the activities center PERIOD
